Old World History - Museum Bundle
Histoire du Vieux Monde - Pack Musée
Geschichte der Alten Welt - Museumsset
Pacchetto Storia del Mondo Antico - Museo
Historia del Mundo Antiguo - Pack del Museo
구세계 역사 - 박물관 번들
Old World History - Museum Bundle
舊世界歷史 - 博物館組合包
舊世界歷史 - 博物館組合包
kDesc

Time to bone up on your history and perhaps find clues as to the fate of the Old Ones. This massive bundle features the "Urban: Museum" map and plenty of new guns and armour too. The bundle contains the following: 
 1. No Man's Land, Museum Expansion Map 
 2. Lucky 13 Light Armour Set 
 3. Eagle Strike Medium Armour Set 
 4. Death From Above Medium Armour Set 
 5. Kill Kill Kill Heavy Armour Set 
 6. Hot Rod Heavy Armour Set 
 7. Bomber Light Armour Set 
 8. Raptor Medium Armour Set 
 9. Peace Light Armour Set 
 10. Hunter Light Armour Set 
 11. Ice Tiger Medium Armour Set 
 12. Heavy Skull Heavy Armour Set 
 13. Rust Marine Heavy Armour Set 
 14. Renegade Weapons Bundle: Locked and Loaded 
 15. Lucky Shot Weapons Bundle: Locked and Loaded 
 16. Sunset Mesa's - Shotgun Bundle [#Legal]

L'heure est venue de réviser votre histoire. Qui sait, vous trouverez peut-être des indices sur les Anciens et ce qui leur est advenu. Ce pack massif comprend notamment la carte « Urbain : Musée » mais aussi une myriade de nouvelles armes et armures. Ce pack est composé des éléments suivants : 
 1. No Man's Land, kit Carte d'extension Musée 
 2. Ensemble Armure légère Lucky 13 
 3. Ensemble Armure moyenne Eagle Strike 
 4. Ensemble Armure moyenne Death From Above 
 5. Ensemble Armure lourde Kill Kill Kill 
 6. Ensemble Armure lourde Hot 
 7. Ensemble Armure légère Bomber 
 8. Ensemble Armure moyenne Raptor 
 9. Ensemble Armure légère Peace 
 10. Ensemble Armure légère Hunter 
 11. Ensemble Armure moyenne Ice Tiger 
 12. Ensemble Armure lourde Heavy Skull 
 13. Ensemble Armure lourde Rust Marine 
 14. Pack d'armes Renegade : Armée et verrouillée 
 15. Pack d'armes Lucky Shot : Armée et verrouillée 
 16. Sunset Mesa - Pack Fusil à pompe [#Legal]

Es ist Zeit, deine Geschichte zu büffeln und vielleicht ein paar Hinweise zum Schicksal der Altvorderen zu finden. Dieses riesige Set enhält auch die Karte "Urban: Museum" und viele neue Waffen und Rüstungen. Das Set enthält die folgenden Artikel: 
 1. No Man's Land, Museumserweiterungskarte 
 2. Lucky 13 Leichtes Rüstungsset 
 3. Eagle Strike Mittelschweres Rüstungsset 
 4. Death From Above Mittelschweres Rüstungsset 
 5. Kill Kill Kill Schweres Rüstungsset 
 6. Hot Rod Schweres Rüstungsset 
 7. Bomber Leichtes Rüstungsset 
 8. Raptor Mittelschweres Rüstungsset 
 9. Peace Leichtes Rüstungsset 
 10. Hunter Leichtes Rüstungsset 
 11. Ice Tiger Mittelschweres Rüstungsset 
 12. Heavy Skull Schweres Rüstungsset 
 13. Rust Marine Schweres Rüstungsset 
 14. Renegade Waffenbündel: Gesichert und geladen 
 15. Lucky Shot Waffenbündel: Gesichert und geladen 
 16. Sunset Mesa's - Flintenset [#Legal]

E' il momento di rafforzare le tue conoscenze storiche e magari scoprire degli importanti indizi sul destino degli Antichi. Questo enorme pacchetto comprende la mappa "Urban: Museum" e una miriade di nuove armi e armature. Il pacchetto contiene i seguenti elementi: 
 1. No Man's Land, mappa di espansione del museo.
 2. Set di armatura leggera Lucky 13 
 3. Set di armature d'assalto medio Eagle Strike 
 4. Set di armature d'assalto medio Death From Above 
 5. Set di armatura pesante Kill Kill Kill 
 6. Set di armatura pesante Hot Rod 
 7. Set di armatura leggera Bomber 
 8. Set di armature d'assalto medio Raptor 
 9. Set di armatura leggera Peace 
 10. Set di armatura leggera Hunter 
 11. Set di armatura media Ice Tiger 
 12. Set di armatura pesante Heavy Skull 
 13. Set di armatura pesante Rust Marine 
 14. Set di armi Renegade: bloccate e caricate 
 15. Set di armi Lucky Shot: bloccate e caricate 
 16. Pacchetto Sunset Mesa - Doppietta [#Legal]

Hora de ponerse al día con tu historia y quizás encontrar pistas sobre el destino de los Antiguos. Este enorme pack incluye el plano "Urbano: Mueseo" y un montón de nuevas armas y armadura. El conjunto contiene los siguiente: 
 1. No Man's Land, Plano de expansión del museo.
 2. Conjunto de armadura ligera Lucky 13 
 3. Conjunto de armadura media Eagle Strike 
 4. Conjunto de armadura media Death From Above 
 5. Conjunto de armadura pesada Kill Kill Kill 
 6. Conjunto de armadura pesada Hot Rod 
 7. Conjunto de armadura ligera Bomber 
 8. Conjunto de armadura media Raptor 
 9. Conjunto de armadura ligera Peace 
 10. Conjunto de armadura ligera Hunter 
 11. Conjunto de armadura media Ice Tiger 
 12. Conjunto de armadura pesada Heavy Skull 
 13. Conjunto de armadura pesada Rust Marine 
 14. Pack de armas Renegade: Cerrado y cargado 
 15. Pack de armas Lucky Shot: Cerrado y cargado 
 16. Sunset Mesa's - Pack de fusil [#Legal]

역사에 대해 배우고, 고대인들에 대한 힌트를 찾을 시간입니다. 이 거대한 번들은 "Urban: Museum (시가지: 박물관)" 맵을 포함하며 다양한 총기류와 상체방어구를 포함하고 있습니다. 이 번들에는 다음이 포함됩니다:


1. No Man's Land, Urban: Museum (시가지: 박물관) 확장 맵
 2. 럭키 13 - 경량 상체방어구 세트(남성) 
 3. 독수리의 일격 - 중형 상체방어구 세트(남성) 
 4. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 상체방어구 세트(남성) 
 5. 살인, 방화, 약탈! - 강화 상체방어구 세트(남성) 
 6. 핫 로드 - 강화 상체방어구 세트(남성) 
 7. 포격수 - 경량 상체방어구 세트(남성) 
 8. 랩터 - 중형 상체방어구 세트(여성) 
 9. 평화 - 경량 상체방어구 세트(여성) 
 10. 사냥꾼 - 경량 상체방어구 세트(여성) 
 11. 빙호 - 중형 상체방어구 세트(여성) 
 12. 무거운 해골 - 강화 상체방어구 세트(여성) 
 13. 녹슨 해병 - 강화 상체방어구 세트(여성) 
 14. 레네게이드 무기 번들: 락 앤 로드 
 15. 럭키샷 무기 번들: 락 앤 로드 
 16. 선셋 메사 - 샷건 번들 


※구입하면, 해당 카테고리에 각 아이템이 추가됩니다. [#Legal]

Time to bone up on your history and perhaps find clues as to the fate of the Old Ones. This massive bundle features the "Urban: Museum" map and plenty of new guns and armour too. The bundle contains the following: 


1. No Man's Land, Museum Expansion Map 
 2. Lucky 13 Light Armour Set (Men) 
 3. Eagle Strike Medium Armour Set (Men) 
 4. Death From Above Medium Armour Set (Men) 
 5. Kill Kill Kill Heavy Armour Set (Men) 
 6. Hot Rod Heavy Armour Set (Men) 
 7. Bomber Light Armour Set (Men) 
 8. Raptor Medium Armour Set (Women) 
 9. Peace Light Armour Set (Women) 
 10. Hunter Light Armour Set (Women) 
 11. Ice Tiger Medium Armour Set (Women) 
 12. Heavy Skull Heavy Armour Set (Women) 
 13. Rust Marine Heavy Armour Set (Women) 
 14. Renegade Weapons Bundle: Locked and Loaded 
 15. Lucky Shot Weapons Bundle: Locked and Loaded 
 16. Sunset Mesa's - Shotgun Bundle


※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]

是時候回顧一下你的歷史，可能可以找到神祕的命運的蛛絲馬跡。這豐富的組合包包括Urban: Museum(城市：博物館)地圖以及一堆全新槍械和裝甲。本組合包包括以下道具：


1. No Man's Land，關卡Urban: Museum(城市：博物館)擴充地圖 
 2. 幸運13輕型裝甲服裝組(男用) 
 3. 飛鷹突擊中型裝甲服裝組(男用) 
 4. 死從天降中型裝甲服裝組(男用) 
 5. 殺殺殺重型裝甲服裝組(男用) 
 6. 灼熱之棒重型裝甲服裝組(男用) 
 7. 轟炸機輕型裝甲服裝組(男用) 
 8. 猛禽中型裝甲服裝組(女用) 
 9. 和平輕型裝甲服裝組(女用) 
 10. 獵人輕型裝甲服裝組(女用) 
 11. 冰虎中型裝甲服裝組(女用) 
 12. 沈重骷髏重型裝甲服裝組(女用) 
 13. 鏽蝕海軍陸戰隊重型裝甲服裝組(女用) 
 14. 叛逆者武器組合包：準備就緒 
 15. 幸運射擊武器組合包：準備就緒 
 16. 日落臺地 - 散彈槍組合包


※購買後，各道具將被置於對應的類別內。 [#Legal]
